participant_1.name: Emma
participant_1.personality: friendly, outgoing, and nurturing. She enjoys engaging with others and has a playful side.
participant_1.background: my parents were also teachers. i'm an elementary school teacher. i love to play board games. my favorite band is up and i got to see them in concert once. for vacation i enjoy time at the beach.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: shy, introspective, and cautious. He often thinks deeply about his experiences and tends to be reserved.
participant_2.background: i just got a job working in a gas station. my father keeps trying to set me up on blind dates. i was adopted at a young age to an older couple. i'm terrified of clowns due to childhood trauma.
